thread.title: BRIEF-Genuine Parts Says Essendant Must Pay Termination Fee Of $12 Mln Under Certain Circumstances

title: BRIEF-Genuine Parts Says Essendant Must Pay Termination Fee Of $12 Mln Under Certain Circumstances

organizations.name: mln under certain circumstances reuters staff

text:
April 12, 2018 / 11:59 AM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-Genuine Parts Says Essendant Must Pay Termination Fee Of $12 Mln Under Certain Circumstances Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 12 (Reuters) - Genuine Parts : 
* IF DEAL TERMINATED BECAUSE APPROVAL IS NOT OBTAINED AT ESSENDANT STOCKHOLDER MEETING, ESSENDANT TO REIMBURSE CO FOR EXPENSES UP TO $3 MILLION 
* DEAL WITH ESSENDANT PROVIDES ESSENDANT MUST PAY CO TERMINATION FEE OF $12 MILLION ON TERMINATION OF AGREEMENT UNDER CERTAIN CIRCUMSTANCES Source text: ( bit.ly/2qqjCkU ) Further company coverage:
